giuliaComment.en: This is where I would stay if I wanted to disappear for a few days. The terraces are incredible—you feel like you're floating between the sky and the sea.
giuliaComment.de: Hier wuerde ich uebernachten, wenn ich fuer ein paar Tage verschwinden wollte. Die Terrassen sind unglaublich—man fuehlt sich, als wuerde man zwischen Himmel und Meer schweben.
giuliaComment.fr: C'est la que je resterais si je voulais disparaitre quelques jours. Les terrasses sont incroyables—on a l'impression de flotter entre le ciel et la mer.
giuliaComment.it: E qui che soggiornerei se volessi sparire per qualche giorno. Le terrazze sono incredibili—ci si sente come se si fluttuasse tra il cielo e il mare.

giuliaComment.en: I always tell people that if you stay here, you should wake up early. Watch the fishermen prepare their boats before the first train arrives.

giuliaComment.fr: Je dis toujours aux gens que s'ils sejournent ici, ils devraient se lever tot. Regardez les pecheurs preparer leurs bateaux avant l'arrivee du premier train.
giuliaComment.it: Dico sempre alle persone che se soggiornano qui, dovrebbero svegliarsi presto. Guardate i pescatori preparare le barche prima che arrivi il primo treno.

description.en: Lovely modern apartment with contemporary amenities and free WiFi in central Riomaggiore location. Features modern furnishings and design while maintaining connection to traditional Ligurian charm of the village.
description.fr: Appartement beau et moderne avec équipements contemporains et WiFi gratuit dans emplacement central Riomaggiore. Dispose mobilier et design modernes tout en maintenant connexion au charme ligure traditionnel du village.
description.it: Appartamento bello e moderno con comfort contemporanei e WiFi gratuito in posizione centrale a Riomaggiore. Dispone di arredi e design moderni mantenendo il collegamento al fascino ligure tradizionale del paese.

seo_title.de: Modernes Apartment Riomaggiore - Zeitgenössisches Design Zentrale Lage | Schöne Möbel
seo_title.en: Modern Apartment Riomaggiore - Contemporary Design Central Location | Lovely Furnishings
seo_title.fr: Appartement Moderne Riomaggiore - Design Contemporain Emplacement Central | Mobilier Beau

seo_description.de: Übernachten Sie in schönem modernen Apartment in Riomaggiore mit zeitgenössischem Design und Annehmlichkeiten. Zentrale Lage mit modernen Möbeln bei Beibehaltung traditioneller Dorfcharme-Verbindung.
seo_description.en: Stay in lovely modern apartment in Riomaggiore with contemporary design and amenities. Central location with modern furnishings while maintaining traditional village charm connection.
seo_description.fr: Séjournez dans appartement moderne et beau à Riomaggiore avec design contemporain et équipements. Emplacement central avec mobilier moderne tout en maintenant connexion charme traditionnel village.
seo_description.it: Soggiorna in appartamento moderno e bello a Riomaggiore con design contemporaneo e comfort. Posizione centrale con arredi moderni mantenendo collegamento fascino tradizionale del paese.

items.name: Affittacamere le Giare
items.description: Located a short walk from the beach and train station, with stellar views and a sunny terrace overlooking the entire town.

items.name: Case Vacanze Scorci Di Mare
items.description: 14th-century building set in Cinque Terre National Park, 50 metres from Riomaggiore's rocky coast, offering sea-view rooms with satellite TV, recently renovated with eco-friendly materials.

items.name: CàTILANA
items.description: 4-minute walk from Riomaggiore Beach, 530-square-foot unit sleeping seven with fully equipped kitchen.

items.name: Crêuza De Mä
items.description: Boasting a seafront location, offers multiple terraces and a solarium, scenic gardens, a heated hot tub, and outdoor showers. Each room offers sea views, air conditioning, a coffee machine, a free mini-bar, and a flat-screen TV.

items.name: EC Luxury Suites
items.description: Perfect location with a small balcony to enjoy "la dolce vita", watching the world pass by. The room and bathroom is very big and clean with wonderful hospitality.

items.name: Hotel Del Sole
tips: Book early due to limited rooms
Great if you have a car - parking available

location.location_description: Located on main street of Riomaggiore, short walk from Fossola Beach, castle, and train station

cons: Can be busy on main street
pros: Parking available - rare in Cinque Terre

room_types.name: Standard Room
room_types.description: Room with standard amenities and access to terrace

items.name: Hotel Due Gemelli
tips: Perfect for those with car - free parking
Request balcony room for best views
Use bus service to access village easily
Great for peaceful retreat away from crowds

location.accessibility_notes: Located on hillside above village. Bus service available to/from Riomaggiore (less than 15 minutes). Not in village center.
location.location_description: Set among pines and vineyards on a hill overlooking Riomaggiore in Cinque Terre, offering spectacular panoramic views

breakfast.notes: Highly rated breakfast with variety of options

cons: Not in village center - requires bus/shuttle
Hill location not ideal for those wanting to be in village
pros: Free parking - rare in Cinque Terre

room_types.name: Double Room with Balcony
room_types.description: Spacious room with balcony offering beautiful sunset views over Cinque Terre

items.name: IL MARE IN CASA
items.description: Apartment located in Riomaggiore's marina, a former fisher's household with a wonderful terrace just above the sea. Very close to shops, cafes, restaurants, train station and ferry station, equipped with Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and all modern amenities.

items.name: LE NOTTI GEMELLE
items.description: Centrally located apartment, a five-minute walk from Riomaggiore Beach and a short drive from other Cinque Terre villages. This one-bedroom, one-bathroom unit offers air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, a fully equipped kitchen with a refrigerator, and provides towels and linens.

location.accessibility_notes: Historic 15th century building with typical stairs
location.location_description: Set in center of Cinque Terre's first village in characteristic 15th-century building, 5-minute walk to the sea

items.name: Martinei
items.description: A small apartment with all essential amenities including a fully equipped kitchen, free WiFi and free toiletries, at a fraction of the cost of other properties with a central location and sweeping balcony views.

items.name: Meb Hotel
items.description: A fabulous hill top guest house situated in Riomaggiore close to the beach, restaurants, shops, and bars. Offers convenient access to all village amenities.

items.name: Scorci di Mare
tips: Ask about private wine tasting experiences
Book the pesto making class they can arrange

location.accessibility_notes: Historic building with typical Cinque Terre stairs
location.location_description: Located in 14th century building in Cinque Terre National Park, 50 meters from rocky coast of Riomaggiore

room_types.name: Sea View Room
room_types.description: Room with sea views and satellite TV in historic 14th century building

giuliaComment.en: I always tell people that if you stay here, you should wake up early. Watch the fishermen prepare their boats before the first train arrives.
giuliaComment.de: Ich sage den Leuten immer, dass sie frueh aufstehen sollten, wenn sie hier uebernachten. Beobachten Sie die Fischer bei der Vorbereitung ihrer Boote, bevor der erste Zug ankommt.
giuliaComment.fr: Je dis toujours aux gens que s'ils sejournent ici, ils devraient se lever tot. Regardez les pecheurs preparer leurs bateaux avant l'arrivee du premier train.
giuliaComment.it: Dico sempre alle persone che se soggiornano qui, dovrebbero svegliarsi presto. Guardate i pescatori preparare le barche prima che arrivi il primo treno.

signature.en: The pulse of the marina, felt through ancient stone walls
signature.de: Der Puls des Hafens, spuerbar durch die alten Steinmauern
signature.fr: Le pouls de la marina, ressenti a travers les murs de pierre anciens
signature.it: Il battito del porticciolo, percepito attraverso gli antichi muri di pietra

intro.en: A 14th-century building that sits so close to the harbor you can hear the boats breathing.
intro.de: Ein Gebaeude aus dem 14. Jahrhundert, das so nah am Hafen liegt, dass Sie die Boote atmen hoeren koennen.
intro.fr: Un batiment du XIVe siecle si proche du port que vous pouvez entendre les bateaux respirer.
intro.it: Un edificio del XIV secolo cosi vicino al porto che potete sentire le barche respirare.

practicalInfo.en: Located right at the harbor. Expect some noise during the day.
practicalInfo.de: Direkt am Hafen gelegen. Erwarten Sie tagsueber etwas Laerm.
practicalInfo.fr: Situe directement au port. Attendez-vous a un peu de bruit pendant la journee.
practicalInfo.it: Situato proprio al porto. Aspettatevi un po' di rumore durante il giorno.

items.name: Sottocoperta
items.description: A homey guesthouse located in the center of Riomaggiore, offering excellent value-for-money with double rooms and apartments, all equipped with free WiFi, AC, desks, flat screen TVs and private bathrooms.
